text: An alien has kidnapped Matt Damon, not knowing what lengths humanity goes through to retrieve him whenever he goes missing.

An alien has kidnapped Matt Damon, not knowing what lengths humanity goes through to retrieve him whenever he goes missing. Matt Damon is not only a national treasure, but he is well regarded in nations all around the world. Because of this, the nations will band together to free him from the evil clutches of the alien emperor. 

The United Nations put together a task force of some of the world's best agents.
